gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfParticipants` SHOULD be equal to + `NumberOfActiveParticipants` + `NumberOfPensioners` + `NumberOfInactiveParticipants` + `NumberOfOtherParticipants`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfActiveParticipants')))) then ((for $v in @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfPensioners')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfPensioners return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfInactiveParticipants')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfInactiveParticipants return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST104Variables1_NumberOfOtherParticipants')))) then ((for $v in @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ParticipantsMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesProvisionPensionObligationsPensionFundNumberParticipantsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
